tm
==

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`TIME <time.md>`__

**Description:**

Describes date and time information.

**Summary**\ 
-------------

-----------

**Details**\ 
-------------

**Field Documentation**\ 
-------------------------

\__tm_gmtoff
------------

::

   long tm::__tm_gmtoff

**Description:**

Seconds east of UTC

\__tm_zone
----------

::

   const char* tm::__tm_zone

**Description:**

Time zone

tm_hour
-------

::

   int tm::tm_hour

**Description:**

Hour. The value ranges from 0 to 23.

tm_isdst
--------

::

   int tm::tm_isdst

**Description:**

Daylight saving time (DST)

tm_mday
-------

::

   int tm::tm_mday

**Description:**

Day. The value ranges from 1 to 31.

tm_min
------

::

   int tm::tm_min

**Description:**

Minute. The value ranges from 0 to 59.

tm_mon
------

::

   int tm::tm_mon

**Description:**

Month. The value ranges from 0 to 11.

tm_sec
------

::

   int tm::tm_sec

**Description:**

Second. The value ranges from 0 to 60.

tm_wday
-------

::

   int tm::tm_wday

**Description:**

Week. The value ranges from 0 to 6. The value **0** indicates Sunday,
the value **1** indicates Monday, and so on.

tm_year
-------

::

   int tm::tm_year

**Description:**

Year. The value is the actual year minus 1900.
